stocks.flavor: Newest theme park is a huge flop, reports record loses. Share prices hits all-time low.
Strong demand for company's library of old movies leads to good share price.
New director of movie acquisitions brings revived prospects for share price.
Box office hit by children's division causes record share price.
Movie buyer fired after third mega-flop! Shares sink. Chairman's bonus cancelled.
Weak earnings report leads to weak price of mutual fund.
Powerhouse market drives fund's price up to record high.
Lower interest rates drive market and fund to strong showing.
Brilliant, young fund manager. Everyone believes he has the Midas touch.
Weak showing in job growth causes lack of consumer confidence. Shares fall with public opinion.
New product flops and tough losses are reported! Share price drops.
Booming market leads to record share price of this electronics seller!
Weak market leads to sagging share price for this electornics seller.
Low interest rates lead to favorable share price for this electronics seller.
Record interest rates lead to substandard share price for this electronics seller.
Low inflation leads to high share price for this longtime pharmaceutical company.
Research and development delays cause low share price for this longtime pharmaceutical company.
Interest rates cripple share price of this longitme pharmaceutical company.
Booming market raises share price of this longtime pharmaceutical company.
Inflation worries cause poor share price for this longtime pharmaceutical comapany.

homes.title: Condo for Sale - 2BR/1BA
homes.flavorText: Excellent 2/1 Condo with many extras. Owner wants to relocate for dream job FAST! She's moving up - you can too! No Cash Flow, but a great possible capital gains opportunity.

homes.title: House for Sale - 2BR/1BA
homes.flavorText: 2/1 house in an older area offered by the Highway Department. The market has crashed and the city MUST sell. No Cash Flow but a possible capital gains opportunity.

homes.title: Condo for Sale - 2BR/1BA
homes.flavorText: Older 2/1 condo offered by young couple who want to move up to a 3/2 house due to growing family. Available soon.

homes.title: House for Sale - 2BR/1BA
homes.flavorText: Nice 2/1 house available in a depressed market due to layoffs. Would make a good investment property for the right buyer.

homes.title: House for Sale - 2BR/1BA
homes.flavorText: Not livedin for six months, this bank-foreclosed house just reduced. Loan includes estimated repair costs.

homes.title: Condo for Sale - 2BR/1BA
homes.flavorText: Bank forclosure! 2/1 condo in a desirable neighborhood close to jobs and stores. Make offer favorable financing by bank.

homes.title: You Find a Great Deal!
homes.flavorText: Comapny bought transferred-manager's 2/1 house. No current tenant, it has been on the market six months and it has just been reduced. Take out a loan if you must, but BUY THIS!

homes.title: You Find a Great Deal!
homes.flavorText: Older 2/1 house, repossessed by government agency. Ready to go with government financing and a tenant. Take out a loan if you must, but BUY THIS!

homes.title: Condo for Sale
homes.flavorText: Parents selling 2/1 condo used by their child in college town. Lots of demand for rentals in this area.

homes.title: House for Sale - 2BR/1BA
homes.flavorText: Nice 2/1 rental house suddenly available due to estate closing. Well-maintained older property with existing tenant.

homes.title: House for Sale - 2BR/1BA
homes.flavorText: Low down payment to pick up this 2/1 house. Owner/seller unexpectedly moving out of town. Right person will do well.

homes.title: House for Sale - 3Br/2Ba
homes.flavorText: Divorce leads to sale of this 3/2 house in an area full of owner-occupied homes. It has been on the market for five months.

homes.title: House for Sale - 3Br/2Ba
homes.flavorText: Skilled tradesman kept this 3/2 house in excellent condition, so it commands top-dollar rent in older neighborhood.

homes.title: House for Sale - 3Br/2Ba
homes.flavorText: Businessman needs cash to save his business and is liquidating this 3/2 house. It is currently occupied by a happy tenant.

homes.title: House for Sale - 3Br/2Ba
homes.flavorText: Split level 3/2 house on out-of-way golf course offered by heirs of owner. Golf membership is included.

homes.title: House for Sale - 3Br/2Ba
homes.flavorText: Nice 3/2 house with inground pool and all nice appliances available in upper-middle-class area. Good schools.

homes.title: House for Sale - 3Br/2Ba
homes.flavorText: 3/2 house in a rough neighborhood. Positive cash flow even though rents are weak.

homes.title: House for Sale - 3Br/2Ba
homes.flavorText: Downsized manager cannot afford payments on new salary and must sell this 3/2 house. The surrounding area is in transition.

homes.title: House for Sale - 3Br/2Ba
homes.flavorText: 3/2 house near the airport. Low cost and lots of cash flow potential, if you can stand the noise.

gold.title: Coin Collector Liquidates
gold.flavorText: A coin collector needs cash quick to shore up a tax issue. Will sell you five (5) gold coiins, well below going rate.

gold.title: Friend Needs Cash Quick
gold.flavorText: A friend has urgent need for money. Will sell you ten (10) gold coins, well below going rate.

gamble.title: Sister-In-Law borrows Money
gamble.flavorText: Sister-in-law is downsized. Needs $5,000 to make house payment. She promises to pay you back $10,000 after she finds a new job.
gamble.instruction: If you choose to help, pay $5,000 and roll 1 die:
gamble.badText: She never pays you back and you're out $5,000
gamble.rewardText: She pays you back $10,000, but family get-togethers are still awkward.

gamble.title: Where There's a Will...
gamble.flavorText: A distant relative passes away. You are named int he will but need to travel to attend.
gamble.instruction: If you attend, pay $750 for travel and roll 1 die:
gamble.badText: You are bequeathed an elderly cat. Enjoy!
gamble.rewardText: You are bequeathed ten (10) Gold Coins. Add these to your Asset sheet.

gamble.title: What's in the Box?!
gamble.flavorText: You have the option to purchase a locked filing cabinet at an estate sale.
gamble.instruction: If you buy the cabinet, pay $500 and roll 1 die:
gamble.badText: You find...ABSOLUTELY NOTHING in the cabinet.
gamble.rewardText: You find...ten (10) Gold Coins. CHA-CHING! Add these to your Asset sheet.

gamble.title: Multi-Level Marketing Buy-In
gamble.flavorText: You have a chance to invest in a Muilti-Level-Marketing opportunity. Company is looking to spread the reach of their newest venture.
gamble.instruction: If you choose to buy-in, pay $500 and KEEP THIS CARD: Every PayDay, roll 1 die:
gamble.badText: No returns this month, but keep trying.
gamble.rewardText: Your sweat equity paid off! Collect $500

gamble.title: Multi-Level Marketing Buy-In
gamble.flavorText: You have a chance to invest in a Muilti-Level-Marketing opportunity. Company is looking to spread the reach of their newest venture.
gamble.instruction: If you choose to buy-in, pay $500 and KEEP THIS CARD: Every PayDay, roll 1 die:
gamble.badText: No returns this month, but keep trying.
gamble.rewardText: Your sweat equity paid off! Collect $500

multi.title: 4-Plex for Sale
multi.flavorText: 4-plex in recovering neighborhood. Fully rented, repairs kept up. Needs your down payment and patience.

multi.title: 4-Plex for Sale
multi.flavorText: 4-plex for sale in rehabilitating neighborhood. Owner being forced out by income tax liens.

multi.title: 4-Plex for Sale
multi.flavorText: Older 4-plex available - forced sale. Out-of-state, financioally distressed owner years behind on taxes. Some records available.

multi.title: 4-Plex for Sale
multi.flavorText: Nice, well-maintained 4-plex in good neighborhood. Stable tenants, positive cash flow, minor repairs.

multi.title: 4-Plex for Sale
multi.flavorText: 4-plex for sale by owner, moving to another state. Full records, fully rented, low occupant turnover in good neighborhood.

multi.title: 4-Plex for Sale
multi.flavorText: 4-plex next to new highway for sale. Owner/occupant moving to quieter area. Priced for quick sale.

multi.title: 8-Plex for Sale
multi.flavorText: Reinvesting owner offers 8-plex for sale at reasonable price. Financing already in place. All it needs is your down payment.

multi.title: 8-Plex for Sale
multi.flavorText: Owner's legal troubles lead to forced sale of this 8-plex. Jump on this deal before someone else does.

multi.title: 8-Plex for Sale
multi.flavorText: Professional person urgently needs cash to save partnership. 8-plex is being sold to raise capital. Great opportunity for the right person.

multi.title: 8-Plex for Sale
multi.flavorText: Owner offers his 8-plex at the current, appraised value. It has all the amenities renters look for. Fully rented at market rent with excellent records.

multi.title: Duplex for Sale
multi.flavorText: Owner is moving out of this duplex due to growing family. Tenant in other unit remains and new tenant waiting to move into this well-maintained property.

multi.title: Duplex for Sale
multi.flavorText: Tenants in place at this investment duplex! Owner has income tax problems and needs to sell quickly.

multi.title: Duplex for Sale
multi.flavorText: Duplex owner must sell to pay hospital bills. Two tenants are in place at this well-maintained property and it is a good investment opportunity.

multi.title: Duplex for Sale
multi.flavorText: Well-maintained duplex in desirable area available due to transfer of owner. Excellent investment opportunity for the right buyer.

multi.title: Duplex for Sale
multi.flavorText: This duplex is the best in the neighborhood! Proud owner retiring to another state to be near her grandchildren.

multi.title: Apartment House for Sale
multi.flavorText: Owner is retiring and this older 24-unity property is fully rented with great cash flow. Great location near a community college.

multi.title: Apartment House for Sale
multi.flavorText: Two buildings totaling 24 units for sale. Owner managed with on-site assistant. Retirement prompts sale. Big Opportunity.

multi.title: Apartment House for Sale
multi.flavorText: 60-unit complex available from pension fund that foreclosed on builder/owner. On-site management in place.

multi.title: Apartment House for Sale
multi.flavorText: 12-unit apartment house offered by out-of-state heirs of handyman/owner. Highly desirable location with a long waiting list for apartment units at this property.

businesses.title: Linmited Partner Wanted
businesses.flavorText: Sandwich shop is doubling the number of locations. Owner needs an investor to get started.

businesses.title: Limited Partner Wanted
businesses.flavorText: Successful doctor expanding office and clinic. Needs partner to fund equity portion of construction costs.

businesses.title: Pizza Franchise for Sale
businesses.flavorText: Healthy pizza company franchise. Trend in high-end fast food is booming. High traffic location next to college campus.

businesses.title: Car Wash for Sale
businesses.flavorText: Family car wash in a prime location is for sale. Family feud forces sale as the want out ASAP.

businesses.title: Limited Partner Wanted
businesses.flavorText: Auto Dealer wants to expand into leasing 2 and 3 year old cars. Needs capital as car maker's finance company is not interested.

businesses.title: Limited Partner Wanted
businesses.flavorText: Successful pizza chain expanding into production of forzen pizzas for grocery stores. Owener needs capital for equipment.

businesses.title: Automated Business for Sale
businesses.flavorText: Vintage arcade with 30 pinball machines and loyal clientale. Owner has become overextended and is desperate to liquidate.

businesses.title: Automated Business for Sale
businesses.flavorText: Personal bankruptcy forces sale of busy, successful laundromat on busy highway. Growth in local area is expected to skyrocket.

businesses.title: Automated Business
businesses.flavorText: Successful 4-bay, coin-operated car wash near busy intersection. Seller is moving to retirement community out of state.
